event.title: NBA 2K16 APK Download
event.description: The NBA 2K franchise is back with the most-true to life NBA experience to date with NBA 2K16. NBA 2K16 is packed with enhancements, new features, updated rosters, and more opportunities to earn Virtual Currency. NBA 2K16 also includes the popular MyCAREER mode as well as a new soundtrack curated by pop super-producer DJ Mustard, renowned producer and rapper DJ Khaled, and legendary hip-hop producer DJ Premier. With enhanced graphic and player models, new animations that provide smoother movement and more realistic articulation combined with new controls and expanded device support, itâ€™s certain to be the most authentic NBA mobile gaming experience yet!
